Package io.proximax.core.crypto

Class Signer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.proximax.core.crypto.Signer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DsaSigner
    public class Signer
extends java.lang.Object
implements DsaSigner
    Wraps DSA signing and verification logic.
